results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Mass Shootings;Deaths (Fatalities);Chesapeake, Va, Walmart Shooting (Nov, 2022);Walmart Stores Inc;Chesapeake (Va)
results.title: Here’s What We Know About the Walmart Shooting in Virginia
results.abstract: A gunman, who was an employee at the store in Chesapeake, killed six people and was later found dead, apparently of a self-inflicted gunshot wound, the police said.

media.caption: Law enforcement officers on the scene the day after a mass shooting at a Walmart in Chesapeake, Va.

results.adx_keywords: Chesapeake, Va, Walmart Shooting (Nov, 2022);Walmart Stores Inc;Chesapeake (Va);Virginia
results.byline: By Eliza Fawcett and Nicholas Bogel-Burroughs
results.title: The Walmart Gunman, a Longtime Manager, Unnerved Some Co-workers
results.abstract: Two former fellow employees said the gunman had feared that the government was watching him.

media.caption: Investigators on Wednesday outside of a Walmart in Chesapeake, Va., where a gunman fatally shot six people and then killed himself.
media.copyright: Kenny Holston for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Colorado Springs Shooting (Nov, 2022);Hate Crimes;Homosexuality and Bisexuality;Transgender and Transsexuals;Aldrich, Anderson Lee;Colorado Springs (Colo)
results.byline: By Jack Healy, Shawn Hubler, Vik Jolly and Edgar Sandoval
results.title: New Details Emerge About Colorado Shooting Suspect
results.abstract: The assailant accused of killing five people in an L.G.B.T.Q. nightclub made an initial court appearance, and identifies as nonbinary, lawyers say.

media.caption: A memorial to the victims of the Club Q mass shooting, outside the club on Tuesday.
media.copyright: Joanna Kulesza for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: All-Terrain Vehicles (ATV);Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters;Traffic Accidents and Safety;Assaults;Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Cooke, Arthur (d 2022);Harlem (Manhattan, NY)
results.byline: By Hurubie Meko and Liset Cruz
results.title: Man Dies After Beating by Swarm of ATV and Dirt Bike Riders
results.abstract: Arthur Cooke died two weeks after the attack from injuries to his neck and spine. The city has been fighting a yearslong battle against the noisy vehicles and their riders.

media.copyright: Dakota Santiago for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Politics and Government;Demonstrations, Protests and Riots;Russian Invasion of Ukraine (2022);Nuclear Weapons;Uranium;Embargoes and Sanctions;United States International Relations;Biden, Joseph R Jr;International Atomic Energy Agency;Iran
results.title: United States Enters a New Era of Direct Confrontation With Iran
results.abstract: The Biden administration has imposed new sanctions on Tehran and expressed support for protesters, as the Iranian government aids Russia in the Ukraine war and continues nuclear enrichment.

media.caption: A protest in Tehran in September. The antigovernment demonstrations were kindled by the arrest and death of Mahsa Amina.

results.adx_keywords: World Cup 2022 (Soccer);Soccer;Hotels and Travel Lodgings;Fans (Persons);Qatar;Doha (Qatar)
results.byline: By John Branch and Erin Schaff
results.title: Peek Inside a $200-a-Night ‘Room’ at the World Cup in Qatar
results.abstract: The ads didn’t lie, but container life might not be for everyone.

results.adx_keywords: Alzheimer's Disease;Genetics and Heredity;Dementia;Hemsworth, Chris
results.title: How to Know if You Have a Genetic Risk for Alzheimer’s
results.abstract: Chris Hemsworth recently revealed that he’s predisposed to dementia. Here’s how to find out if you’re at risk — and what to do if you are.

results.adx_keywords: Midterm Elections (2022);Elections, House of Representatives;Peltola, Mary;Palin, Sarah;Republican Party;Democratic Party;House of Representatives;Alaska
results.title: Mary Peltola Wins Bid to Serve Full Term in the House for Alaska
results.abstract: Ms. Peltola became the first Alaska Native woman elected to Congress earlier this year when she won a special election in the state.

media.caption: Representative Mary Peltola at a candidate forum in October. Ms. Peltola’s victory in the special election earlier this year was considered an upset against former Gov. Sarah Palin of Alaska.
media.copyright: Brian Adams for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Elections, House of Representatives;Conservatism (US Politics);Midterm Elections (2022);United States Politics and Government;Presidential Election of 2008;Content Type: Personal Profile;Palin, Sarah;Peltola, Mary;McCain, John;Republican Party;Alaska
results.title: Sarah Palin Loses as the Party She Helped Transform Moves Past Her
results.abstract: The former Alaska governor, once the standard-bearer of the G.O.P.’s dog-whistling, no-apologies culture, was no match for the same forces she rode to national prominence.

media.caption: Sarah Palin at a candidates’ forum last month in Anchorage. She was defeated in the race for Alaska’s lone House seat by Mary Peltola, a Democrat.
media.copyright: Brian Adams for The New York Times

results.adx_keywords: Virtual Currency;Banking and Financial Institutions;Regulation and Deregulation of Industry;HK FTX Trading Ltd (Futures Exchange);Farmington State Bank
results.title: Crypto Firm FTX’s Ownership of a U.S. Bank Raises Questions
results.abstract: Through a subsidiary, FTX invested $11.5 million in the parent company of Farmington State Bank, which has a single branch and, until this year, just three employees.

media.caption: Alameda Research invested $11.5 million in the Farmington State Bank’s parent company, FBH.

results.adx_keywords: Colorado Springs Shooting (Nov, 2022);Veterans;Content Type: Personal Profile;Fierro, Richard M;Colorado Springs (Colo)
results.title: Army Veteran Went Into ‘Combat Mode’ to Disarm the Club Q Gunman
results.abstract: Richard M. Fierro, who served for 15 years in the military, was at the nightclub in Colorado Springs with his family when the gunman opened fire. “I just knew I had to take him down,” he said.

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Robinson, Shanquella (d 2022);Cabo San Lucas (Mexico);Charlotte (NC)
results.title: F.B.I. Investigates Death of American Woman in Mexico
results.abstract: Shanquella Robinson, 25, of Charlotte, N.C., had traveled last month to Mexico with six friends, according to her father. “I just want justice for my daughter,” he said.

media.caption: A “celebration of life” service for Shanquella Robinson, 25, in Charlotte, N.C., last weekend.

results.adx_keywords: Midterm Elections (2022);Murkowski, Lisa;Senate;Alaska
results.title: Lisa Murkowski Wins Re-election in Alaska, Beating a Trump-Backed Rival
results.abstract: Ms. Murkowski was the only Senate Republican up for re-election this year who voted to convict former President Donald J. Trump in his impeachment trial after the Jan. 6, 2021, riot.

media.caption: Senator Lisa Murkowski in Talkeetna, Alaska, this past summer. She was facing Kelly Tshibaka, a conservative rival backed by Donald J. Trump and the state Republican Party, and Pat Chesbro, a Democrat.
media.copyright: Ash Adams for The New York Times

results.title: An Ancient Language, Once on the Brink, Is a British Isle’s Talk of the Town
results.abstract: After being nearly silenced, Manx is experiencing a revival on the Isle of Man, thanks in part to an elementary school and some impassioned parents.

results.adx_keywords: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Walmart Stores Inc;Chesapeake (Va)
results.title: ‘I Just Watched 3 of My Friends Killed’: An Employee Describes the Shooting
results.abstract: The employee, Donya Prioleau, said the store’s overnight manager opened fire inside the employee break room.

media.caption: A makeshift memorial in the parking lot of the Walmart in Chesapeake, Va., where six people were shot and killed on Tuesday.

results.adx_keywords: Television;internal-sub-only;Colbert, Stephen;Fallon, Jimmy;Meyers, Seth;Corden, James (1978- )
results.title: Late Night Predicts a Tough Thanksgiving
results.abstract: For the humans, there’s inflation; for the turkeys, there’s avian flu. “To be fair, I’m pretty sure every Thanksgiving is a tough one for turkey,” said Stephen Colbert.

media.caption: Stephen Colbert says inflation is going to squeeze your Thanksgiving dollar, “but the number one factor, according to experts, is Hunter Biden’s laptop.”

results.title: Welcome to Tumblr. Now Go Away.
results.abstract: Tumblr is seeing an uptick in activity after Elon Musk's Twitter takeover, but some longtime users are wary of newcomers.

results.adx_keywords: Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings;Sheriffs;Mental Health and Disorders;Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides;Glass, Christian (d 2022);Colorado;Denver (Colo);Rocky Mountains
results.title: Sheriff’s Deputies Are Indicted in Fatal Shooting of Man Who Called 911
results.abstract: The Sheriff’s Office in Clear Creek County, Colo., said it fired the deputies, Andrew Buen and Kyle Gould, after they were charged in connection with the shooting of Christian Glass, 22, in June.

media.caption: Police body camera footage shows Christian Glass behind the wheel of his Honda Pilot after it became stuck on an embankment on a mountain road near Silver Plume, Colo., on the night of June 10.

results.title: A U.S.-Made Missile Went Astray in Ukraine, Injuring Civilians
results.abstract: An air-launched AGM-88B missile, built to destroy enemy radars, apparently missed its target and hit an apartment building in Kramatorsk in September.

media.caption: AGM-88 air-to-surface missiles aboard the aircraft carrier U.S.S. Gerald R. Ford off the coast of Virginia in October.

results.title: What We Know About the Walmart Shooting Victims
